resources.string: Get the latest agriculture news delivered right to your phone every day. Know what\'s happening in the farming world so you can make smart decisions.
Worried about a sick plant? Just take a picture with your phone or upload one you already have. Our app will identify the disease, explain the cause, and suggest the right treatment.
Have a question about farming? Our friendly chatbot is ready to help! Ask anything about agriculture and get instant, helpful answers.
